fields.title: method of moments
fields.pointers:
* Some other parameter estimation methods include:
**  [maximum likelihood](maximum_likelihood)
**  [Bayesian parameter estimation](bayesian_parameter_estimation)
* In  [exponential families](exponential)  families, the maximum likelihood solution  [is equivalent](maximum_likelihood_in_exponential_families)  to moment matching.
fields.summary: The method of moments is a simple method for estimating the parameters of a probability distribution from data. The parameters are chosen so that the model moments match the empirical moments.
